title: Query a Provider for Documentation Clarification
description: A coder finds the clinical documentation is ambiguous and needs to ask the provider for clarification to assign the correct code.

tasks.description: Identify the patient encounter with the ambiguous documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder finds the specific note that requires clarification.

tasks.description: Create a new 'coder query' in the EHR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder opens the specific tool for sending clinical documentation questions to providers.

tasks.description: Write a concise question for the provider (e.g., 'Was the pneumonia bacterial or viral?') and route it to their inbox.
tasks.expected_outcome: The query is sent to the provider, and the claim is put on hold pending their response.
